name: Locked Game
description:
Made for GDU game jam 2021. Theme: Unlock.
The goal is to get the key out of the pod so you can Unlock the actual game.

Once playing after the main menu.
WASD to move. You need to click to start.
Use terminals with E (must be near)

What's missing: Lacking many sound effects and VFX and textures

There is a camera bug when using the tablets with E. And throwing boxes out of the level will require a reset.
